testcase.name: Check if the home page opens correctly
testcase.system-out: Given I have navigated to the Sinsay home page and accepted cookies.........passed Then the home page should open correctly....................................passed

testcase.name: Search for a product and verify results
testcase.system-out: Given I have navigated to the Sinsay home page and accepted cookies.........passed When I search for "Футболка"................................................passed Then I should see search results containing "футболка"......................passed

testcase.name: Navigate to a product details page
testcase.system-out: Given I have navigated to the Sinsay home page and accepted cookies.........passed When I search for "Джинси"..................................................passed And I navigate to the first product details page............................passed Then I should see a product details page with a title.......................failed
